importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the Tiny Desk Carousel feature, which highlights a collection of featured Tiny Desk Concerts.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The time of day when the Tiny Desk Carousel was published, indicating when the audience could access the featured concerts.

keyTakeAways: The Tiny Desk Carousel features a collection of highlighted Tiny Desk Concerts.
The feature is published on Wednesdays at 2:20 PM EST.
It serves as a curated showcase of live, intimate musical performances from the Tiny Desk Concert series.

namedEntities.name: Tiny Desk Carousel
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A feature on the Home Page that showcases a collection of featured Tiny Desk Concerts.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The Tiny Desk Carousel is a platform for showcasing live, intimate musical performances from the Tiny Desk Concert series, highlighting the variety and quality of content available to audiences.

namedEntities.name: Tiny Desk Concerts
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A series of live, intimate music performances held at NPR's studios.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The concerts are central to the Tiny Desk Carousel, providing the musical content that is curated and presented to audiences.

namedEntities.name: NPR
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A major U.S. public media network known for its music and cultural programming.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: NPR is the host and publisher of the Tiny Desk Concerts and the Tiny Desk Carousel, providing the platform and context for these performances.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The feature is scheduled for Wednesdays, creating a consistent rhythm for audience engagement.

namedEntities.name: 2:20 PM EST
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The specific time when the Tiny Desk Carousel is published.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The publication time ensures timely access to the featured concerts and aligns with audience viewing habits.

summaryOfNewsArticle: The Tiny Desk Carousel, a feature on NPR's Home Page, showcases a curated collection of featured Tiny Desk Concerts. Published every Wednesday at 2:20 PM EST, it offers audiences access to intimate, live music performances from artists across genres, highlighting the cultural and artistic value of live, in-studio music. This feature is relevant to the world beyond the article because it promotes accessible, high-quality, and diverse musical content that resonates with listeners who value authenticity and artistic expression. Within the article, the Tiny Desk Carousel serves as a central platform for presenting and promoting the Tiny Desk Concert series, which is a hallmark of NPR's music programming.
title: A collection of featured Tiny Desk Concerts
